alert.note: Alert for Covington; Forrest; Jones; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Forrest, Covington, northeastern Lamar and southwestern Jones Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Collins, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Seminary around 610 PM CDT. Sanford around 620 PM CDT. Moselle around 625 PM CDT. Rawls Springs and Eastabuchie around 630 PM CDT. Petal around 640 PM CDT. Macedonia and Sunrise around 645 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central, central and southeastern Mississippi.
